definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing mountain/☶/ancient Chinese compass point: 45° (northeast)
to bring under permanent control/to effect a radical cure

sentences.chinese: 電池可以爲12V的32根線束供電。

sentences.english: The foot of the wall should be stained brown.
6But when the sun came up, the plants were scorched, and they withered because they had no root.
sentences.chinese: 日頭出來一曬，因爲沒有根，就枯乾了。

sentences.english: My little brother always forgets to wash behind his ears.
sentences.chinese: 我的小弟弟老是忘記洗耳後根。

sentences.english: Higher equivalent stress was found when compression and extension loadings were applied to the pedicle of vertebral arch and interarticularis.
sentences.chinese: 椎弓根和椎弓峽部在壓力和後伸負荷下等效應力較高。

sentences.english: The man struck a match and lit his cigar.
sentences.chinese: 那人劃了根火柴點燃雪茄。

sentences.english: The theoretical breakthrough of plutonomy originated basically from the breakthrough of productivity.
sentences.chinese: 政治經濟學的理論發展根源於生產力的突破。

sentences.english: He has made a walking stick for his grandfather from the bamboo pole.
sentences.chinese: 他用這根竹杆給他祖父做了根手杖。

sentences.english: The rate of decomposition was not affected by methylene blue and ethanol.
sentences.chinese: 亞甲藍和乙醇不影響過亞硝酸根的分解速率。

sentences.english: Once the crop has rooted in this soil, it should grow well.
sentences.chinese: 稼在這肥沃的土壤裏生了根，就會生長很茂盛。

sentences.english: Root is diarch, the diameter lesser than A. obliterata.
sentences.chinese: 根爲二原型，直徑比後者略小些。

sentences.english: Lisa Guernsey is the Director of New America's Early Education Initiative.
sentences.chinese: 麗莎根西島，是新美國的早期教育計劃主任。

sentences.english: Nematodes , particularly in sandy soils, attack roots, forming galls and stunting the trees.
sentences.chinese: 線蟲，特別是沙質土壤，攻擊根，癭的形成和發育樹。

sentences.english: In the blood, it breaks down into lactate and hydrogen ions.
sentences.chinese: 在血液中，乳酸分解爲乳酸根和氫離子。

sentences.english: The most common torque need for the upper incisors during orthodontic treatment is increased palatal root torque.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的扭矩需要切牙正畸治療中增加齶根扭矩。

definition: classifier for trees, cabbages, plants etc
branch/classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc
tree trunk/stump (tree root)/a plant/classifier for trees or plants/strain (biology)/to involve others (in shady business)
thick and thin/coarse and fine/thickness (caliber)/coarseness/quality of work
to cut off (a length)/to stop/to intercept/section/chunk/length
classifier for small spheres, pearls, corn grains, teeth, hearts, satellites etc
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
